Issue.creator: greg.haskins
Issue.summary: Add support for Subject Alternative Names (SANs)
Issue.description: cryptogen allows a very flexible configuration of the x509 CN. However, there are many applications in which the support for SANs may be desired. For instance, DNS names within a kubernetes cluster are different than the endpoints surfaced to the outside world. It might be convenient to allow flexibility here by extending the cryptogen template to support the definition of Subject Alternative Names.
